name: kafka-producer-consumer
description: 1) `docker-compose up` 2) Create a topic in kafka using the below command     ```     docker exec -it kafka /opt/bitnami/kafka/bin/kafka-topics.sh \     --create \     --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 \     --replication-factor 1 \     --partitions 1 \     --topic test     ``` This will create a topic named `test`.
